item.description:
Your boy is back in Connecticut and only here for a few weeks before moving to Hollywood, California. Come out because I'm looking forward to seeing all of you and catching up!

Enjoy a cup of coffee, tea, or whatever your choice of beverage is. It's a great way to meet other members and socialize. Good people and good conversation for a Tuesday night! We only can do a maximum of 8 people since most Starbucks are small for seating a big group.

This has been a big hit with everyone in the past so we are going to do this event on a weekly basis from here on out. We may also change Starbucks locations on a weekly basis. Hope to see you all there! Until then have fun and enjoy.

Cheers,

John
item.how_to_find_us: Give John a call or text at 860-919-9782. Email is fine too. You can also look for the tall guy with red hair.
item.name: Starbucks
